title: Neon, UFO Select ‘De Lo Mio’ Director Diana Peralta for Second Feature Development Residency (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Neon, the studio behind best picture Oscar winner “Anora,” and UFO, a nonprofit organization that supports filmmakers, have selected Diana Peralta as the next participant in their residency program that supports artists making their sophomore features. The UFO x Neon residency is designed for filmmakers developing their second narrative feature, specifically targeting those who, in [...]

title: Trump UFO announcement predicted to come in just DAYS after mysterious 'insider' tip
description: A sudden shift in a popular prediction market has experts and the public both believing the world is just days away from learning that UFO are real and alien life exists.

title: Polymarket odds soar on possible Trump release of UFO files as speculation intensifies
description: A sudden leap in prediction-market odds has cast fresh attention on the prospect of UFO file disclosure in the US. The spike has triggered broad debate among analysts who caution that market movement does not always reflect real policy decisions.
